camel.sink.endpoint.clientId.name: camel.sink.endpoint.clientId
camel.sink.endpoint.clientId.description: A virtual client id to force the creation of a new connection instance

camel.sink.endpoint.discoveryEndpointSuf.name: camel.sink.endpoint.discoveryEndpointSuffix
camel.sink.endpoint.discoveryEndpointSuf.description: A suffix for endpoint URI when discovering

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.allowedSecurityPolic.name: camel.sink.endpoint.allowedSecurityPolicies
camel.sink.endpoint.allowedSecurityPolic.description: A set of allowed security policy URIs. Default is to accept all and use the highest.

camel.sink.endpoint.keyAlias.name: camel.sink.endpoint.keyAlias
camel.sink.endpoint.keyAlias.description: The name of the key in the keystore file

camel.sink.endpoint.keyStoreUrl.name: camel.sink.endpoint.keyStoreUrl
camel.sink.endpoint.keyStoreUrl.description: The URL where the key should be loaded from

camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingPublishReq.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingPublishRequests
camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingPublishReq.description: The maximum number of pending publish requests

camel.sink.endpoint.maxResponseMessageSi.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maxResponseMessageSize
camel.sink.endpoint.maxResponseMessageSi.description: The maximum number of bytes a response message may have

camel.sink.endpoint.overrideHost.name: camel.sink.endpoint.overrideHost
camel.sink.endpoint.overrideHost.description: Override the server reported endpoint host with the host from the endpoint URI.

camel.sink.endpoint.requestedPublishingI.name: camel.sink.endpoint.requestedPublishingInterval
camel.sink.endpoint.requestedPublishingI.description: The requested publishing interval in milliseconds

camel.component.milo-client.clientId.name: camel.component.milo-client.clientId
camel.component.milo-client.clientId.description: A virtual client id to force the creation of a new connection instance

camel.component.milo-client.configuratio.name: camel.component.milo-client.configuration
camel.component.milo-client.configuratio.description: All default options for client configurations

camel.component.milo-client.discoveryEnd.name: camel.component.milo-client.discoveryEndpointSuffix
camel.component.milo-client.discoveryEnd.description: A suffix for endpoint URI when discovering

By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.milo-client.basicPropert.name: camel.component.milo-client.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.milo-client.basicPropert.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.milo-client.allowedSecur.name: camel.component.milo-client.allowedSecurityPolicies
camel.component.milo-client.allowedSecur.description: A set of allowed security policy URIs. Default is to accept all and use the highest.

camel.component.milo-client.maxPendingPu.name: camel.component.milo-client.maxPendingPublishRequests
camel.component.milo-client.maxPendingPu.description: The maximum number of pending publish requests

camel.component.milo-client.maxResponseM.name: camel.component.milo-client.maxResponseMessageSize
